examples: The café served a delicious breakfast sandwich with eggs, cheese, and ham on a toasted bagel.
The cinnamon raisin bagel is my go-to choice for a tasty breakfast.
They mixed Welsh onion with cream cheese for a tasty spread on their morning bagels.
I love spreading cream cheese on my toasted bagel in the morning.
He ordered a pastrami and egg breakfast sandwich, served on a toasted bagel, to start his day off right.

examples: we'll be serving brie and baguette for breakfast.

He walks with a big baguette all the time.
